posts.title: G7CR
posts.body:
G7 CR - A Noventiq Company, is Asia's leading information technology, consulting, and cloud services company which helps businesses accelerate and transform through empowering cloud journeys. We are an exclusive "Gold Partner", and "ISV- Recruitment Specialist Partners" of Microsoft and have won the "Country Partner Award - Microsoft " for consecutively 2 years.

Our 500+ employees & 200+ Azure Certified Professionals, bring you the agility in driving your end-to-end cloud transformation Journey. Talk to us at 1800-572-3617 for any cloud-related assistance.
